trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla un evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> evento se produce justo antes de que se cierra un formulario, ya sea por el usuario, a través de la interfaz de usuario (UI), o mediante programación, a través de llamadas a métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> (clase), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> en la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> clase.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
